title: $20 million tax hike subject to multiplier effect

content.question: Assume that the marginal propensity to consume is 0.90. As a result of an increase in the tax rates, the government collects an additional $20 million. What will be the impact on gross domestic product (GDP) ?

choices.label: GDP will increase by a maximum of $200 million.
GDP will increase by a maximum of $180 million.
GDP will decrease by a maximum of $200 million.
GDP will decrease by a maximum of $180 million.
GDP will decrease by a maximum of $20 million.

content.answer: GDP will decrease by a maximum of $180 million.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
